backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user IDs, roles, registration flows, and one-time superadmin claiming with access‑control enforcement.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend changes for InternalLogin superadmin-claim behavior and related checks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing behavior and styling of all frontend pages and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining color variables, dark mode values, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app root and main.tsx script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Manual history-based router selecting React pages and dashboards plus a fallback 404 view.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing access control and invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider handling Internet Identity login, stored identities, status flags, and logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query hook that checks if the current actor can create a task UI.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/_shared/PageShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing centered content area and footer styling.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientLogin.ts: Client login page with disabled login buttons and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientRegister: Client registration form with disabled submit and fields for personal details.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Admin dashboard showing a static message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AsistenmuD: Asistenmu dashboard presenting a thank‑you message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ClientDash: Client dashboard displaying a task creation button controlled by a permission query.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/ConciergeD: Concierge dashboard with a gratitude message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/FinanceDas: Finance dashboard with a stability message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/PartnerDas: Partner dashboard showing a motivational message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/Superadmin: Superadmin dashboard displaying a system control message and disabled logout.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLand: Internal landing page offering internal login and registration options.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Internal login page with Internet Identity auth, role extraction, superadmin-claim check, and redirect logic to internal dashboards.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Static internal registration form UI with fields for name, email, WhatsApp, and role, plus disabled submit button.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Landing page offering login and registration options for client, partner, and internal users.
Static partner login page showing disabled login buttons and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerRegist: Static partner registration form UI with profile fields and a disabled submit button.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them from sessionStorage, and clearing them.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing current scope, constraints, known issues, and architecture rules.
